title: Donkey Is Welcoming Fans into 'Shrek's Swamp' on Airbnb this Halloween — See Inside! - Yahoo Canada Shine On
content:
Donkey Is Welcoming Fans into 'Shrek’s Swamp' on Airbnb this Halloween — See Inside!

Calling all ogre enthusiasts, Shrek's home is available for booking on Oct. 13

This Halloween, Donkey has you covered!

DreamWorks’ lovable sidekick is letting you vacation in Shrek’s Swamp! Guests of the animated early 2000s classic Shrek can soon call the ogre’s stumpy, secluded haven home thanks to Airbnb.

Donkey will be house-sitting for his trusty companion, and has decided to open up the Swamp doors for an exclusive two-night swamp stay for up to three friends from Oct. 27-29, 2023.

The mud-laden, moss-covered, murky-watered oasis that is Shrek’s Swamp is nestled in the hills of the Scottish Highlands.

This charming and cozy refuge is the perfect secluded spot to enjoy a brisk autumn day and starry nights to hibernate like a true ogre would. The live-in tree stump features a studio layout with two beds and one bathroom.

Never miss a story — sign up for PEOPLE's free daily newsletter to stay up-to-date on the best of what PEOPLE has to offer, from juicy celebrity news to compelling human interest stories.

Alix McIntosh Shrek House Air Bnb, Bed

Although there are signs labeled “Danger,” “Stay Out,” and “Beware Ogre” that lead up to the Swamp house, think of it as Shrek’s way of welcoming you home.

The property is a perfectly snug spot to escape from village life and embrace the beauty of nature.

“I’m absolutely delighted to invite you in for a fairytale stay,” Donkey said in a description of the listing posted to Airbnb.

Alix McIntosh Shrek House Air Bnb, Dining Room

While vacationing in the Swamp, guests will have the chance to stay up late, swap stories, and eat like an ogre — because in the morning, Donkey’s making waffles!

This will be the first time fans are welcomed into Shrek’s humble abode and in true ogre fashion, the toilet, sink and shower facilities will be located off-site, approximately 20 meters away from Shrek’s Swamp.

Alix McIntosh Shrek House Air Bnb, Outhouse

“Shrek’s Swamp is lovely. Just beautiful. The perfect place to entertain guests,” Donkey said. “You know what I like about it? Everything. The overgrown landscaping, the modest interiors, the nice boulders, all of it. I can’t wait for guests to experience this muddy slice of paradise for themselves.”

It’s important to keep in mind that staying at Shrek’s Swamp isn’t a contest! Any fan of the ogre can stay for just £0 a night — a nod to the priceless refuge he has provided fairytale creatures of all kinds!

Related: There's an Official 'Hocus Pocus' Airbnb! Kathy Najimy Reveals the 'Spooky, Fantastic' Salem Cottage's Secrets

However, those interested will have to abide by a few simple rules.

Guests at Shrek’s Swamp must have an active Airbnb profile with a good track record on the platform, own a government-issued ID, and be at least 5 years of age, in addition to several other terms and conditions.

Since this isn’t a contest, guests are responsible for their own travel to and from Scotland.

The wildly popular franchise featured Mike Myers as the voice of Shrek, Eddie Murphy as Donkey, and Cameron Diaz as Princess Fiona.

Related: 'Shrek' Reboot in Works with Original Cast in Negotiations to Return: 'There's Tremendous Enthusiasm'

To honor good childhood memories that last a lifetime, Airbnb will make a one-time donation to HopScotch Children’s Charity, which provides some of Scotland’s most vulnerable and disadvantaged children with respite breaks through nurturing and dynamic holiday trips.

Onion and ogre enthusiasts can request to book Shrek’s Swamp beginning Oct. 13 at 6 p.m. BST at airbnb.com/shrek.

Shrek’s Swamp isn’t the only mega movie mansion that’s been up for grabs as of late.

Earlier this year, Airbnb reopened the doors to the Barbie Dream House in Malibu ahead of the iconic doll’s July 21 feature film release!

Airbnb/Hogwash Studios Barbie's Malibu Dreamhouse up for rent on Airbnb

In stark contrast to the ogre’s unique stay, visitors of Barbie’s multilevel pink home enjoyed a disco dance floor, a roller rink, a gym, a bar and grill, and an infinity pool (adorned with floats that spell out Ken’s name, of course).

However, like Shrek’s Swamp, those staying at the Malibu mansion were also able to do so at no cost to them “because Ken couldn’t figure out how to put a price on Barbie’s Malibu Dream House — after all, Ken’s thing is beach, not math!”

For more People news, make sure to sign up for our newsletter!

Read the original article on People.

title: Cardano (ADA) And Everlodge (ELDG) Price Predictions, Matrixport Claims Binance (BNB) Will Remain A Leading Exchange - NewsBTC
content:
Matrixport, a prominent crypto finance platform, recently emphasized the staying power of Binance (BNB), hinting at its ongoing dominance within the exchange sphere. Additionally, the Cardano (ADA) strides toward decentralized governance and Everlodge’s (ELDG) innovative approach to real estate have sparked intrigue and speculation within the crypto community.

Binance (BNB): Top Exchange Status Until 2026

Amidst Changpeng Zhao’s announced departure as the CEO of Binance (BNB), Matrixport’s recent report suggests that the leading crypto exchange is set to maintain its top-three position for the next few years. The analysis projects a two to three-year window before increased market competition potentially impacts Binance’s standing.

Despite the leadership transition, Binance Coin has shown resilience, marking 20 out of 30 days as bullish in the last month and exhibiting a 4.49% price volatility. The Binance coin price increased from $219 to $234 during that time.

Experts are optimistic in their Binance Coin price predictions, foreseeing a surge in its value to $515 by December 2023. This forecast and Matrixport’s insights show the market’s confidence in Binance’s continued prominence within the cryptocurrency exchange realm.

Cardano (ADA): Empowers Decentralization Efforts

The Cardano (ADA) Foundation has recently stood behind CIP-1694, a significant move to advance the network’s decentralization. This proposal marks a pivotal step, giving Cardano crypto holders an active role in decisions impacting the network’s evolution.

Cardano Foundation will vote using a wallet containing 11M ADA. This advocacy aligns with Cardano’s good performance, trading above its 21 and 50-day EMAs. The Cardano price has increased from $0.25 on October 22nd to $0.37 on November 22nd.

Experts anticipate its value to reach $0.44 before 2023 ends in their Cardano price predictions, reflecting its foundation’s strategic initiatives toward network decentralization.

Everlodge (ELDG): On Course to Outshine Binance and Cardano

Everlodge (ELDG) stands poised on the brink of a breakthrough, potentially outshining even Binance and Cardano. Its promise lies in its strengths: tapping into the trillion-dollar real estate market, offering tangible real-world utilities, and using NFTs. This vision will disrupt the entire sector.

Luxurious villas, hotels, and vacation homes will be digitized and minted into NFTs on this property marketplace. Afterward, they are fractionalized by Everlodge. This means you can become a fractional owner of them for a lower price. The possibilities for passive income will be endless because once the real-world asset value rises, so will the NFTs.

Hey, Lodgers! 🏡 Do you know? 🤔

With $ELDG, enjoy the warmth of passive income, monthly surprises, and exclusive club access.

Plus, who can resist sweet discounts? Dive into a token that feels like home. 💙 Join the presale: https://t.co/kIufYkD05d#Presale pic.twitter.com/9yzt5hZhul — Everlodge (@EverlodgeHQ) September 26, 2023

Additionally, you may offload your holdings on secondary markets. By engaging in these markets, traders will gain the ability to trade their NFTs fast, responding to market dynamics and potentially capitalizing on favorable price movements.

Unlike Binance and Cardano, Everlodge is in its early stages – Stage 7 of its presale. One ELDG native token costs just $0.025, but it has already provided buyers with a 150% ROI. Thanks to its low market cap and ties to a resilient market, experts claim it will surge much faster and higher. Therefore, they foresee its value rising by 30x on its launch day – outstanding gains.

Visit Everlodge
